MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles, affecting properties in Violet Bank and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.41am. Our engineers have arrived at the Rosetta Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.45am on the 5th of March 2021.
